CSS Style¶

This macro is used to add CSS content to a page

Example¶

Wiki¶

\{\{cssstyle
h3 { background-color: blue;  }
\}\}

Output¶

As you can see all h2 headers on this page are colored blue

      • Wiki
      • Output
